VUZI Vuzix had to fake what its lame technologyglasses could achieve Take a look at what Hololens and Magic Leap are achieving and let me know what you think the real AR is Just because you put something directly superimposed in front of one eyeball should not make it AR at least not in this day and age

VUZI MONEYBOT Sooo dumb AR a technology that superimposes a computergenerated image on a users view of the real world thus providing a composite view
VUZI investorscomnewstechnolo

VUZI Did you know this demo was a complete liefabrication The augmented 3D model shown is be recorded by the Blade Camera In real life the wearer of the Blade cant not see the 3D model in this manner because he is only able to see it through one eye the other eye not seeing it makes the whole augment reality effect not achievable

VUZI The funniest thing about this board and company is the claim to the be in the ARAugmented Reality space None of the products Vuzix has augments reality they just puts flat and static information in front of one eye These non stereoscopic glasses should in no way be called AR glasses in the true since of the term Hololens and Magic Leap are true AR Vuzix is just bastardizing the term
